title: Alternate Dragon Slayer Yasuo
body:
Yeah... I know... I copy pasted it from Monster Hunter itself {{item:3070}} 

But I just can't help seeing it okay? </3

https://stickybunton.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/rathalosarmor.jpg

and 

http://www.imgbase.info/images/safe-wallpapers/video_games/monster_hunter/8965_monster_hunter.jpg

Can't you feel the power?

Q - Fiery breath sound / Q - Tornado with a dragon spiraling (dragon roar)
W - Flame wings wall
E - Fire tracks while dashing
R - Gains with dragon wings for aerial combo and gains dark red aura while his bonus armor pen. is up.

replies.body: Rathalos gear looks too much like a western knight and isn't quite Yasuo's style. Personally, I'd go with Nargacuga armor and longsword, if only because it vaguely resembles his base skin.

So you want to make him into the living embodiment of a Rathalos?

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/monsterhunter/images/1/13/3rdGen-Rathalos_Render_001.png/revision/latest?cb=20150303231420

I mean if they could get Capcom's okay... Would totally buy it!
